name: Alpaca Cino
description:
DESCRIPTION

Cino is an alpaca. He enjoys grazing on the fresh greens in his backyard, spits when he gets upset and hates when people confuse him for a llama.

But Cino isn't just any ordinary alpaca. With a natural knack for acting, he set out to Hollywood Hills to make his fortune as a renowned movie star. As alpacas aren't exactly well respected among the human acting community though, Cino devised a plan that would allow him to infiltrate the big screen. He created the alias of Al Pacino, a scruffy Italian bad boy, and his act was so convincing that it wasn't long before he took the world by storm.

Now he spends his days relaxing in his lawn chair, occasionally rising to the occasion of a new block buster, and crossing his hooves that the FBI don't find out about his woolly secret.

###########################################################
